properties.displayName: Sysmon Discovery Via Default Driver Altitude Using Findstr.EXE
properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where ProcessCommandLine contains " 385201" and ((FolderPath endswith "\\find.exe" or FolderPath endswith "\\findstr.exe") or (ProcessVersionInfoOriginalFileName in~ ("FIND.EXE", "FINDSTR.EXE")))

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects usage of "findstr" with the argument "385201". Which could indicate potential discovery of an installed Sysinternals Sysmon service using the default driver altitude (even if the name is change
